title: Anyone spot whats wrong with this picture?
body:
Because i can.
And i spot a non ultimate move that can be used every 9 seconds doing more damage than an ultimate move with a 200 sec cooldown. 

they had almost identical AP, so tell me why should this be the case?

replies.body:
Karthus deals dmg to ALL targetable enemy champion GLOBALLY.But Gragas E he needs to get up close to hit it.
And most likely,he leveled E first.
So example
If Karthus ults at base and get a kill,he get a kill!
But if Gragas is trying to kill a low health enemy,he cant do it at a safe distance which he might burn a flash or risk diying to tower.
{{champion:245}}
called the recrap screen for a reason
one hits every enemy on the map regardless of where they are, the other doesnt?
Imagine that Karthus's ult only damaged one enemy but could be used every 9 seconds, that would be broken as fuck, so its not really a fair comparison.

{{champion:30}} 200 sec cooldown, no CC whatsoever, plenty of warning to heal/shield/zhonyas
{{champion:79}} 9 sec cooldown, can still hit all 5 people if grouped, knock back and stun.

and the fact that gragas is played 3x more than Karthus attests to the fact that people prefer a 9 second damage stun/knockback instead of a 200 sec global damage.
%%%%% dont be postin from a smurf to hide yourself, also you a dumb ass bitch
Look at the name of one karthus abilties XD
Maybe he also maxed his ability first
It still shouldn't out damage an ultimate like karthus's, what if maxing Ezreal's Q meant it did more than Ezreal's ult? that wouldn't be right either.

no because ezreals q is on a lower cooldown so it would have less damage. Lvl 1 karthus ult does 250 + 60% ap, maxed gragus slam does 280 +60% ap. Gragus also has more magic pen. I dont see what the problem here is.
i see the problem. you died.

One has magic pen the other doesn't. One has naturally tankier stats the other doesn't. 

I don't know what the big deal is here?
